Detailed Description

XHTMLTemplate extention. Representents a XHTML Page with its body and its headers.

Definition at line 39 of file XHTMLPageTemplate.php.

Member Function Documentation

XHTMLPageTemplate::__construct (   ) 
 

instanciates a XHTMLPageTemplate. Sets a default skeleton for valid XHTML1.1. Initialises XHTMLBodyTemplate for the body tag named TAG_BODY Initialises XHTMLHeadersTemplate for the head tag named TAG_HEADERS

Reimplemented from XHTMLTemplate.

static XHTMLPageTemplate::ConvertIntoSGML (  $  source  )  [static]
 

Converts $source string into valid SGML string char by char.

Parameters:

Returns:
the valid SGML string that correspond to $source string

Definition at line 59 of file XHTMLPageTemplate.php.

XHTMLPageTemplate::Generate (   ) 
 

Generates a printable version of object for final print out. It replaces each tag by it's Template Generated value. So it generate final document by hierarchy.

The final document's characters are converted into valid SGML ones.

Returns:
printable version of document with valid SGML characters.
See also:
Template::Generate()

XHTMLPageTemplate::ConvertIntoSGML();

XHTMLPageTemplate::GetBody (   ) 
 

Gets the XHTMLHeadersTemplate that corresponds to body tag named TAG_BODY.

Returns:
the XHTMLHeadersTemplate object that corresponds to head tag named TAG_HEADERS.
